channel.title: Is it possible to include a dynamic Redash dashboard in an Angular application
channel.description: Hello, I want to integrate dynamic(login-based) Redash dashboard with my angular app. Is there an example of how to use redash dashboard (depending on access token maybe by using dashboard Parameter) in another app?

item.title: Is it possible to include a dynamic Redash dashboard in an Angular application
item.dc:creator: wyvela
item.description:
Hello, I want to integrate dynamic(login-based) Redash dashboard with my angular app.
Is there an example of how to use redash dashboard (depending on access token maybe by using dashboard Parameter) in another app?

Read full topic
